name: Backyard
longDesc: This is your first time in the backyard. If you turn east and face the house, a basement hatch is on the south-eastern corner, and a door to the dining room is on the north-eastern corner. There is a patio umbrella folded on the ground next to this exit. To the west, there is a sandbox. There is an eagle circling overhead. You need to collect sand from the sandbox. You can use the umbrella to hide from the eagle.
description: You are in the backyard. If you turn east and face the house, a basement hatch is on the south-eastern corner, and a door to the dining room is on the north-eastern corner. There is a patio umbrella folded on the ground next to this exit. To the west, there is a sandbox. There is an eagle circling overhead.

eagle.name: eagle
eagle.description: The eagle seems to have noticed you.  You wonder if it will swoop down to grab you if you step into the yard.

sandbox.name: sandbox
sandbox.description: There is a sandbox full of sand, toys, and buckets.

sand.name: sand
sand.description: The sand is in the sandbox, you need it for the quest

squeekyToy.name: squeekyToy
squeekyToy.description: This is a red ball squeeky toy. Your dog can hear this from a mile away and will come running, can serve a similar function to the dog whistle
